title: DineroPay | Empowering Your Payments, Driving Digital Transformation
description: DineroPay powers Saudi’s gateway for secure, seamless payments – accept transactions, manage payouts, and streamline financial operations with powerful APIs and intuitive tools.

home.slogan: Simplifying Payments to Grow Your Business
home.sloganDescription: Secure and Reliable Payment Solutions to Empower Your Business Success in the Kingdom.
home.trustedByTeams: Trusted by the most innovative teams

solutionsSection.title: Tailored Payment Solutions to Drive Growth
solutionsSection.tagline: From Startups to Enterprises, We've Got You Covered
solutionsSection.description: Our platform is built to meet the unique needs of different industries. Whether you're a startup looking to scale, an enterprise optimizing operations, a SaaS business integrating subscriptions, an e-commerce store increasing conversions, or a nonprofit streamlining donations — we’ve got you covered with secure, seamless payment solutions.

banner.title: Great news!
banner.description: We now support Tabby for easy, flexible payments. Read More

productsSection.title: Effortless Payments
productsSection.tagline: Everything you need to power secure, seamless transactions.

section1.title: Mobile-Friendly Payments
section1.description: Deliver a smooth checkout experience optimized for mobile users. Whether your customers are on smartphones or tablets, our solution ensures fast, reliable, and user-friendly payments.

section2.title: Secure Payments
section2.description: Protect your customers and business with end-to-end encryption, fraud detection, and PCI DSS compliance. Our platform ensures every transaction is safe, secure, and fully compliant with global standards.

section3.title: Available Payment Methods
section3.description: Offer your customers multiple payment methods, including credit cards, digital wallets, and local payment options. Our platform ensures a seamless and secure checkout experience.

section4.title: API & SDK
section4.description: Integrate payments quickly with our easy-to-use API and SDK. Build custom payment workflows, automate tasks, and seamlessly connect with your existing systems to scale faster.

stats1.description: API requests per day, peaking at 100 requests a second.

blogSection.title: From Our Blog
blogSection.subTitle: Discover insights, strategies, and tips to help you grow your business and optimize payments.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Get Started?
ctaSection.description: Create an account instantly to get started or contact us to design a custom package for your business.
